short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ultra enhances your ChatGPT: build web apps, tailor prompt libraries, integrate with Docs, Gmail, sites, YouTube, and save prompts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash the full potential of ChatGPT with Ultra, the quintessential Chrome extension that redefines your AI interactions. Whether you're a professional seeking productivity boosts, a content creator, or just someone looking to get more out of ChatGPT, Ultra offers features that cater to all.

Features:

Build Web Applications: Extend the versatility of ChatGPT by creating web applications directly within Ultra. Solve countless use cases for everyone—from dynamic content generation to interactive tools—all powered by AI.

Form Builder for Prompt Templates: Increase productivity by constructing prompt templates using intuitive forms. Advanced users can streamline their workflows and get the most out of ChatGPT's capabilities.

Pin Chats and Bookmark Responses: Never lose track of important conversations. With Ultra, you can pin chats and bookmark significant prompt responses for quick and easy reference anytime.

Google Sheets Integration: Supercharge your spreadsheets by running prompts across multiple cells simultaneously. Ultra's integration with Google Sheets enables you to harness AI power at scale within your data.

Custom Prompt Libraries: Tailor ChatGPT's capabilities to fit seamlessly into your daily life. With Ultra, you can create and curate libraries of prompts specifically designed for your individual needs.

Save Your Prompts: Don't lose that perfect question or line of thought. Save any prompt into your library for easy access and future reference.

Unlimited Text Length: Experience the freedom to run long texts without worrying about token limits, ensuring richer and more in-depth conversations with ChatGPT.

Interact with Websites: Let ChatGPT browse and interact with websites on your behalf. Whether it's data extraction or quick research, Ultra makes it possible.

File Interactions: Allow ChatGPT to access and interact with local files. From document summaries to content suggestions, the possibilities are endless.

YouTube Integration: Dive into the world of video with ChatGPT's ability to interact with YouTube. Get video summaries, content ideas, or even just some entertainment recommendations.

Email Assistant: Make email drafting effortless. Ultra integrates with Gmail, allowing ChatGPT to help you craft perfect emails, be it for business or personal correspondence.

Elevate Your AI Conversations with Ultra!

Experience a new era of AI interactions that are more flexible, expansive, and tailored to you. Upgrade with Ultra today.
